posts.title: Spring Schedule Released
posts.content: Our spring program schedule is now available! Check out new clinic times, league options, and special events planned for March through May. We've added more evening options and a brand new Wine & Tennis social series.
posts.author: Marcy Borr

posts.title: Court Resurfacing Complete
posts.content: Great news! Courts 3 and 4 have been freshly resurfaced and are ready for play. Enjoy the improved bounce and grip! The new surface is a premium cushioned acrylic that's easier on joints.
posts.author: Marcy Borr

posts.title: Winter Warm-Up Routine
posts.content:
Cold muscles need extra care! Here's Coach Lexi's favorite 10-minute warm-up routine to prevent injuries during winter play:

1. Light jog around the court (2 min)
2. Arm circles and shoulder rolls (1 min)
3. Leg swings front-to-back (1 min each leg)
4. Lateral lunges (1 min)
5. Torso rotations (1 min)
6. Mini rallies from service line (3 min)
posts.author: Lexi Borr
